<@Compendium[sfrpg.rules.aKqRtg165rAly1Cc]{Poisons}

Track the progress in the details tab in "Base Value". 0; Healthy, 3; Blinded.

To keep the affliction type a secret, renaming the item is suggested. This does not prevent the player from looking at the details tab to learn the affliction type.

@Compendium[sfrpg.equipment.cfOeM4RwUa1kfagc]{Amblaree}

Type poison (injury); Save Fortitude DC 13
Track Wisdom (special); Frequency 1/round for 3 rounds
Effect Progression track is Weakened—Impaired—Blinded; no end state. When at the blinded stage, the victim gains the blinded condition.
Cure 1 save

Modifiers currently do not effect Ability DCs, as well as spellcasting limitations

Wisdom Poison Track

Healthy—Weakened—Impaired—Blinded

Weakened

The victim takes a –2 penalty to Will saves and Wisdom-based ability checks and skill checks, and the DCs of his spells and special abilities decrease by 2. If he has 1 or more levels in a spellcasting class whose key ability score is Wisdom, he can’t cast his highest level of spells from that class.

Impaired

The victim takes an additional –2 penalty to the affected checks, and the affected DCs decrease by an additional 2. If he has 1 or more levels in a spellcasting class whose key ability score is Wisdom, he can’t cast his 2 highest levels of spells from that class.

Blinded; no end state

When at the blinded stage, the victim gains the blinded condition.
